heroDescription: Palm Desert, California, is a vibrant city known for its stunning desert landscapes and thriving tourism industry.
landscapeDescription: The economy of Palm Desert is primarily driven by tourism, retail, and healthcare services. The city attracts visitors year-round, contributing to its economic stability.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Palm Desert's economy has shown resilience with a steady growth rate of 3% annually, driven by tourism and retail sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Palm Desert is approximately $60,000, reflecting a diverse economic base with significant retirees.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Palm Desert increasingly focus on retirement planning and wealth management for affluent retirees.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Palm Desert is slightly above the national average, driven by housing and healthcare costs.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Palm Desert's real estate market is competitive, with home prices rising due to high demand from retirees and investors.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Palm Desert's business climate is favorable for small businesses, particularly in hospitality and retail sectors.
